subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In a rout of Georgia Tech, North Carolina’s first home game since Dean Smith’s death, the Tar Heels opened with a four corners play that led to a Brice Johnson layup.
snippet: In a rout of Georgia Tech, North Carolina’s first home game since Dean Smith’s death, the Tar Heels opened with a four corners play that led to a Brice Johnson layup.
